23 November 3
Maj. W. H. Sidell U. S. A
A. A Pro. Mar Gen of Ky.
Louisville -- Ky.
Major,

Your "Poster" to accelerate volunteering &c. has been submitted to the Governor and meets his approval. We therefore, accept your suggestion to send us a thousand, and will use them to the best advantage.

I will send you a copy of the letter addressed to the various Commanding Generals of Departments in which Kentucky troops are serving -- to which I have added copies of the letters from the Pro. Mar. General -- as per your late enclosure to the governor.

Respectfully
Your obedt serv't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen of Ky.
